statements: DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp < '2021-01-01' AND activity_duration > 60;

DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_date < '2022-01-01';
